## rgbToAnsi256() function

Converts an RGB color to the nearest ANSI-256 color index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function rgbToAnsi256(rgb: RGB): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

rgb


</td><td>

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)


</td><td>

RGB color with values 0-255


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

ANSI-256 color index (0-255)
